Posts.Content: Apr 7, 2016 02:32PM nursedars wrote: Seroma, and infection. I called and got in right away as you said. Aspired lots at site , and needed two different antibiotics. Now chemotherapy started 3/9/16 and have second 3/30/16. Used Chemo cold caps for the two treatments, but my hair was very fine to start with, and now much, much thinner, No balding, just very thin. Now my mission is to look for a wig.
Posts.Title: Swollen breast Praline nursedars
